name: Farmer's Grocery - Ecommerce App
description: Farmer's Grocery is a platform where users can get fresh groceries directly from the farm. It contains features for end users such as order & address management, payment integration, wishlist and cart.

name: Sell At Farmers Grocery - Seller App
description: This web app provides the easiest way to sell grocery products directly to customers. Users can add/edit multiple products, can review the orders from customers and get payments in wallet.

name: Real Farmer Quiz - Quiz App
description: Real Farmer Quiz is a simple, fun and interactive web app to learn about agriculture.Users will get a certificate at the end of it, can download or share the link of certificates with friends.

name: Sanvaad - Social Media App
description: Sanvaad is a social media app through which users can share their thoughts with the community users. On Sanvaad, user can create profiles & can search and follow other users.

name: LiveFarm - Video Library App
description: Video Streaming Platform For the farmers, where they can take notes and see the curated list of videos based on farming.

name: cssStack - Component Library
description: This is a component library made with SASS. some of the class names are inspired from emmet.
